amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-366 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25, 26, and 27.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25, 26, and 27, printed in Part B of House Report 117-366.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al (TX) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 192 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
